question: who of the following has been made the women's cricket representative of International Cricket Council (ICC) Cricket Committee?
explanation: Belinda Clark has been made the women's cricket representative. She replaces Clare Connor who has finished her third and final three-year term. Belinda Clark is former Australian women's team captain. Kyle Coezter has been appointed as the Associate Members representative. He succeeds Ireland's Kevin O'Brien. Kyle Coezter is the Scotland skipper. Mike Hesson has been made the Full Member team coach representative. He succeeds Darren Lehmann. Mike Hesson is the New Zealand national team coach. All the three have been appointed to the committee for an initial term of 3 years.
